oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Relics from the battlefield at Parker's Crossroads
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: The relics include a curb chain from a bridle bit, a standard U. S. officer's belt plate, a Confederate "I" button, an oval U. S. cartridge box plate, a U. S. Eagle breastplate, shrapnel, a plain French brass civilian coin button, and an unknown piece of iron. Among the assorted lead bullets are a 2-ring Belgian, a Sharp's carbine, CSA .69 caliber bullet and a Smith carbine.
oai_dc:dc.dc:format: Clothing; Tools and equipment; Weapons and ammunition
